title: BOUNDARIES Announces European Tour With VARIALS, DAGGER THREAT & NO FACE NO CASE
description: Kicking off on April 5 in Hannover, Germany.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 1 day ago
excerpt: Kicking off on April 5 in Hannover, Germany.
text: Boundaries will hit the road for a European headlining tour in 2025 with support from Varials, Dagger Threat, and No Face No Case. The tour kicks off on April 5 at Musikzentrum in Hannover, Germany, and wraps up on April 26 at Gebäude 9 in Cologne, Germany. Tickets are available here. 4/5 Hannover, DE Musikzentrum4/6 Bruges, BE Jeugdhuis COMMA4/8 Bristol, UK The Fleece4/9 Nottingham, UK Rescue Rooms4/10 Glasgow, UK Cathouse Rock Club4/11 Manchester, UK Rebellion4/12 Leeds, UK The Key Club4/13 London, UK The Dome4/14 Southampton, UK The Joiners4/16 Haarlem, NL Patronaat4/17 Hamburg, DE LOGO4/19 Berlin, DE Badehaus4/20 Leipzig, DE Naumanns4/21 Warsaw, PL VooDoo Club4/23 Wien, AT Viper Room4/24 München, DE Backstage Club4/25 Aarau, CH KIFF4/26 Cologne, DE Gebäude 9 Want More Metal? html:
Boundaries will hit the road for a European headlining tour in 2025 with support from Varials, Dagger Threat, and No Face No Case. The tour kicks off on April 5 at Musikzentrum in Hannover, Germany, and wraps up on April 26 at Gebäude 9 in Cologne, Germany. Tickets are available here.
